title: Looking for a team, or friends â™¥
body:
Im a 20 year old female NSW. Currently lvl 30 unranked. 
Im an average-y player, not great, not pure shit either.
I want a team/friends who can help me out, or even help each other out to become better etc...

I'm alright with most positions but jng. I usually Support, but do want to get better at other lanes.

add me on LoL if interested :)

thanks, 
jandzio
xx

replies.body:
hey im 19 male sydney! i can help u out with mid lane if u like :P 
CANT HELP U WITH OTHERLANES DOEE :(
i'd love to play with u!

add me on LOL if interested

Bribery
big fan man. always spec u on high elo spectate

so, you support, I jungle({{champion:11}} or {{champion:19}})  or top({{champion:14}} or{{champion:23}} ), and fill({{champion:1}} or{{champion:22}} ) otherwise, but I need good sup people such as{{champion:16}} , I will add you, look forward to playing games with you :D

played {{champion:16}} before patch but am okay now.
atm i use {{champion:25}} {{champion:43}}  as supp

:)
Yeah my favourite supports are Morgana and Braum

Im a 19 year old female VIC Currently lvl 30 platinum 2.
Im an average-y player, not great, not pure shit either. 
I want a team/friends who can help me out or even help each other out to become better 
etc...

I'm alright with most positions but jng. I usually Ad Carry, but don't want to get better at other lanes.

add me on LoL if interested :) 

thanks, 
Arclight Vayne
xx

Hey, i just got back to the game after a 1 year break and moved from EU to OCE, i was silver 1 bracket last time i remember playing but looking to join a casual team to play with, i have almost all champions and can play any role but my jgl is a bit crappy since i dont know new content :D 
i added you in game so just ping me if you want to play. cheers :)
